Medium: One from a portfolio of ten lithographs
Title: "USING A BLACK, HARD CRAYON, PUT FIFTY SMALL DOTS, AT RANDOM, OVER THE SURFACE OF THE STONE. THEN CONNECT EACH DOT WITH A STRAIGHT LINE. PRINT THE RESULT IN FOUR COLORS (YELLOW, BLACK, RED AND BLUE) BY TURNING THE STONE A QUARTER TURN FOR EACH COLOR.", from the portfolio WORK FROM INSTUCTIONS
